title: How Jesus, JBP, PVK and Francis Schaeffer saved me from Alex Jones and his dangerous misinformation

Notes

https://youtube.com/c/PaulVanderKlay

https://ezekiel337.com/f/the-necessity-of-skepticism

Or to view the video of me reading it

https://youtu.be/ZagOwD6r8L4
